name: Super Jet Fighter
description:
A game about controlling a jet fighter plane, shoot lasers at the opponent while avoiding them and the space asteroids! Play against the CPU, or a friend (same keyboard). A reimagination of the Atari game with the same name (Jet Fighter, 1975).

CONTROLS:

  • Player 1 - Left/Right and Up Arrows (move and shoot).
  • Player 2 - A/D and W (move and shoot).
  • Pause - Esc.

CHANGELOG:

  • 1.0.0 - Initial release.

ASSETS USED:
